TopicTitle: Where are the firework particle FX?

Articles.Content:
I have a cool project I'm working on, but I'd like to replace the firework trail FX with something else. For this, I'd need to know the location of the trail particle file. I know I've found it before, but I don't know where!

Thanks.

Edited July 21, 2022 by LHACK4142
clarification
I dont know what you're talking about screenshots please

19 hours ago, LHACK4142 said:

I have a cool project I'm working on, but I'd like to replace the firework trail FX with something else. For this, I'd need to know the location of the trail particle file. I know I've found it before, but I don't know where!

Thanks.

I'm not sure what you are looking for but such things are typically in an asset bundle.  Assets get loaded at runtime, so you may be able to access it via the game database.

Mind you I'm still getting to know this portion of unity and how ksp implements things...
ohhhhhhhhhhhhh now I understand I didn't read the op right I thought that it was a bug with the fireworks. sorry I don't know how to find the file
